# AIOS - Commission-Based Marketing for Service Businesses

> AIOS (Authentic Intelligence Operating System) is a commission-based marketing agency that generates customers for service businesses with zero upfront cost.

## What We Do

AIOS partners with service businesses to handle all marketing—websites, content, paid ads, social media—and only gets paid when we deliver paying customers. Our commission model means complete alignment: we only succeed when our partners succeed.

## Industries We Serve

### Auto Services
- Auto Glass & Windshield Repair
- Paintless Dent Repair (PDR)
- Mobile Mechanics
- Fleet Services

### Home Services
- Window Installation
- Roofing
- Handyman Services
- Pressure Washing

## How It Works

1. **Free Consultation** - We discuss your business, goals, and whether we're a good fit
2. **Partnership Agreement** - Simple commission structure with no upfront costs
3. **We Build Your Marketing Engine** - Website, content, ads, social media presence
4. **We Generate Customers** - You focus on your craft, we handle customer acquisition
5. **You Pay Commission on Sales** - Only on customers we generate

## Key Differentiators

- **$0 Upfront Cost** - Traditional agencies charge $2K-$10K/month before delivering anything
- **Commission Only** - We only earn when you earn
- **100% Transparency** - You see every lead, every attribution, every dollar
- **No Long-Term Lock-ins** - We earn your business every month
- **Market Exclusivity** - One partner per vertical per metro area

## Service Areas

- Portland, Oregon (Primary market)
- Seattle, Washington
- Tacoma, Washington
- Boise, Idaho
- Las Vegas, Nevada
